enWisdom: Anger is the conveyance of impetuosity
Anger evokes impetuosity
Through excessive anger, impetuosity comes about
Anger is an evil which will destroy [you] if you obey it
Anger strikes down its possessor and exposes his faults

Wisdom: بِئْسَ الْقَرِينُ الْغَضَبُ يُبْدِي الْمَعَايِبَ وَيُدْنِي‏ الشَّرَّ وَيُبَاعِدُ الْخَيْرَ
enWisdom: How evil an associate anger is! It exposes faults, brings evil closer and distances good

Wisdom: كَثْرَةُ الْغَضَبِ تُزْرِي بِصَاحِبِهِ وَتُبْدِي مَعَايِبَهُ
enWisdom: Increased anger degrades its possessor and exposes his faults

Wisdom: الْغَضَبُ نَارٌ مُوقَدَةٌ مَنْ كَظَمَهُ أَطْفَأَهَا وَمَنْ أَطْلَقَهُ كَانَ أَوَّلَ مُحْتَرَقٍ بِهَا
enWisdom: Anger is a kindled fire, one who suppresses it extinguishes the fire and one who lets it burn freely is the first person who will be burnt by it
Beware of anger, for it is indeed a burning fire
Anger arouses hidden feelings of malice

Wisdom: إِيَّاكَ وَالْغَضَبَ فَأَوَّلُهُ جُنُونٌ وَآخِرُهُ نَدَمٌ
enWisdom: Keep away from anger, for its beginning is madness and its end is regret
Yielding to anger leads to regret and disobedience
One who acts violently, regrets

Wisdom: أَفْضَلُ سَبَبٍ كَفُّ الْغَضَبِ وَالتَّنَزُّهُ عَنْ مَذَلَّةِ الطَّلَبِ
enWisdom: The best means [to achieve closeness to Allah] is refraining from anger and keeping away from the humiliation of asking [others]
One who gets angry frequently makes others weary [of him]
One who turns his anger loose hastens his [own] death
Whoever submits to his anger, his ruin is hastened

Wisdom: مَنْ كَثُرَ سَخَطُهُ لَمْ يُعْرَفْ رِضَاهُ
enWisdom: One whose displeasure is much, his pleasure is not known

Wisdom: مَنْ كَثُرَ غَضَبُهُ لَمْ يُعْرَفْ رِضَاهُ
enWisdom: One whose anger is much, his pleasure is not known
One whose displeasure is much is not admonished

Wisdom: مَنْ غَضِبَ عَلَى مَنْ لَا يَقْدِرُ عَلَى مَضَرَّتِهِ طَالَ حُزْنُهُ وَعَذَّبَ نَفْسَهُ
enWisdom: He who gets angry on the one whom he cannot harm, prolongs his sadness and torments himself

Wisdom: مَنِ اغْتَاظَ عَلَى مَنْ لَا يَقْدِرُ عَلَيْهِ مَاتَ بِغَيْظِهِ
enWisdom: He who gets angry upon one whom he has no power over, dies with his rage

Wisdom: لَا تُسْرِفْ فِي شَهْوَتِكَ وَغَضَبِكَ فَيُزْرِيَا بِكَ
enWisdom: Do not exceed the limits in your lust and anger as they will degrade you
Do not disgrace yourselves in order to alleviate your anger
There is no etiquette with anger
There is no relationship move vile than anger
